data.text: @dunvirkin Government have heard other scientific points of view but are told to dismiss them as misinformation. I believe they are fully aware of the decisions they are making, even though the decisions are not theirs to make.

@TheShad78631449 Govt listening only to its small cocoon of bureaucrats posing as clinical experts. I rather listen to widespread, world renowned medical Drs and Scientists who voicing loudly their concerns about threats to life and injury to result from mass human trials of unorthodox vaccines.
@TheShad78631449 Only double faxed 10% of population. How many more deaths is still to be described as safe? Govt is spreading misinformation. As it is known to do as a matter of normal practice.

@TheShad78631449 Govts only concern seems to be about keeping face. Invested a lot of political capital in Vaccine rollout and Covid response before. To be forced to withdraw vaccine as becoming proven unsafe would destroy any vestige of credibility it has left. All about numbers vaccinated.
@dunvirkin Because they love spending money that is not theirs

@ChrisCorney1 @TheShad78631449 @Birdonwing About 0.25% seems very high. If it was % of about 15% who become infected would be internationally comparable. Most people under say 60 not likely to be much affected. Most deaths are amongst elderly. Natural attrition would be about 740000 each year.
@ChrisCorney1 @Birdonwing @dunvirkin Total BS. You are clearly a shill who likes spouting propaganda for corrupt reasons!
@dunvirkin I believe that many more will die before this ends, sadly!
@TheShad78631449 @Birdonwing @dunvirkin There's about 150,000 deaths in my country that I believe can be attributed to covid 19.

@TheShad78631449 It’s Covid roulette. Who vaccine hurts or kills is random. Everyone only has one life. Once substance is in it stays in and now confirmed it travels throughout body and accumulates in vital organs where be likely future harm. Life is precious. Seems insane to risk it.
@TheShad78631449 Govt is getting blood on its hands and yet it still pushes hard for people to get the jab. IMO it’s a crime against humanity and I sure hope the lawyers come.
@dunvirkin There have now been 4 deaths in NZ that I believe can be directly attributed to the Covid vaccine experiment!
